{% highlight javascript %}
function tan (arg) {
  //  discuss at: http://phpjs.org/functions/tan/
  // original by: Onno Marsman
  //   example 1: Math.ceil(tan(8723321.4) * 10000000);
  //   returns 1: 54251849

  return Math.tan(arg)
}

{% endhighlight %}

## Example 1

{% endhighlight %}
